page.title: 16The Landcover Survey.
page.content: On Thursday we went right through the middle of the island.It wasn't so long as going right round.We went to Tibbets and had half of our dinner there.I woundn't like to live at Tibbets because it is so far away from the shop and pub.After that we walked to the North Lighthouse and had all of our dinner.We saw lots of seals down there.We went right through the middle to do the land survey.Most of it was heather and grass.From here to Quarter Wall was rough enclosed grazing ground.It got worse when we got past Quarter Wall.It was all ferns,heather and rock. When we came back we saw Mr.Hanks on top of Rat Island.Mrs.Dench told us to go and look for different kinds of seaweed.We saw a Blue Rayed Limpet,it was lovely but we had to go and put it back where we found it.
